plot: Alone is a documentary about the living state of poor families in Iraq. It focuses on orphans and how women are battling to live with their children. The documentary offers ground-level insight into poor life in Iraq.
title: Alone
plot_es: Alone is a documentary about the living state of poor families in Iraq. It focuses on orphans and how women are battling to live with their children. The documentary offers ground-level insight into poor life in Iraq.
